content:
This chunk is the introductory section of the document titled "Asset Pipeline," which provides an overview of how to import content from other tools into Panda3D. It includes a table of contents listing topics such as model file formats, EGG files, glTF files, and conversions from Blender, Maya, 3ds Max, along with previewing models and tips.

Asset Pipeline

This section explains how to import content produced in other tools into Panda3D.

Table of Contents

model-file-formats egg-files/index gltf-files converting-from-blender converting-from-maya converting-from-3ds-max previewing-models tips
